gen:link.msg:message: The total of `BenefitsOnTerminationOfServiceManagingSupervisoryDirector` reported with `ManagingOrSupervisoryDirectorOrRepresentativeNamesAxis` SHOULD be equal to `BenefitsOnTerminationOfServiceManagingSupervisoryDirector` without `ManagingOrSupervisoryDirectorOrRepresentativeNamesAxis`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped2_SetTBenefitsOnTerminationOfServiceManagingSupervisoryDirector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped2_SetTBenefitsOnTerminationOfServiceManagingSupervisoryDirector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped2_SetNTBenefitsOnTerminationOfServiceManagingSupervisoryDirector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped2_SetNTBenefitsOnTerminationOfServiceManagingSupervisoryDirector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The total of `LongTermBenefitsDirector` reported with `ManagingOrSupervisoryDirectorOrRepresentativeNamesAxis` SHOULD be equal to `LongTermBenefitsDirector` without `ManagingOrSupervisoryDirectorOrRepresentativeNamesAxis`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped6_SetTLongTermBenefitsDirector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped6_SetTLongTermBenefitsDirector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped6_SetNTLongTermBenefitsDirector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped6_SetNTLongTermBenefitsDirector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The total of `ProfitSharingAndBonusPaymentsManagingSupervisoryDirector` reported with `ManagingOrSupervisoryDirectorOrRepresentativeNamesAxis` SHOULD be equal to `ProfitSharingAndBonusPaymentsManagingSupervisoryDirector` without `ManagingOrSupervisoryDirectorOrRepresentativeNamesAxis`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped1_SetTProfitSharingAndBonusPaymentsManagingSupervisoryDirector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped1_SetTProfitSharingAndBonusPaymentsManagingSupervisoryDirector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped1_SetNTProfitSharingAndBonusPaymentsManagingSupervisoryDirector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped1_SetNTProfitSharingAndBonusPaymentsManagingSupervisoryDirector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The total of `RegularRemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirector` reported with `ManagingOrSupervisoryDirectorOrRepresentativeNamesAxis` SHOULD be equal to `RegularRemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirector` without `ManagingOrSupervisoryDirectorOrRepresentativeNamesAxis`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped5_SetTRegularRemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped5_SetTRegularRemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped5_SetNTRegularRemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped5_SetNTRegularRemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The total of `RemunerationManagingDirectorsAdjustment` reported with `ManagingOrSupervisoryDirectorOrRepresentativeNamesAxis` SHOULD be equal to `RemunerationManagingDirectorsAdjustment` without `ManagingOrSupervisoryDirectorOrRepresentativeNamesAxis`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped3_SetTRemunerationManagingDirectorsAdjustment')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped3_SetTRemunerationManagingDirectorsAdjustment return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped3_SetNTRemunerationManagingDirectorsAdjustment')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped3_SetNTRemunerationManagingDirectorsAdjustment return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The total of `RemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirector` reported with `ManagingOrSupervisoryDirectorOrRepresentativeNamesAxis` SHOULD be equal to `RemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirector` without `ManagingOrSupervisoryDirectorOrRepresentativeNamesAxis`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped4_SetTRemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped4_SetTRemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped4_SetNTRemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped4_SetNTRemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirector` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_RemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_RemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfRemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirectorDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfRemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirectorDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfRemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirectorCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationDirectorsSpecification_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfRemunerationManagingSupervisoryDirectorCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
